name: Deep Flight Oraxia
description:
Deep Flight Oraxia leverages the theme of "Duality" by having two core gameplay modes. The first is a frantic bullet hell shmup that takes place in the air. Once the player collects weapon resources in the air, they can plunge below the surface in search of alien technology. The underwater portions are a slower and exploration-focused. We had an ambitious idea and didn't quite pull it off within the original 48hrs. We did spend some time after the jam brining it to its current state.
